title: Rugby Themed Skin Ideas
body:
Hi guys!

I think this skin would be an awesome edition to the 'league' community. This thread is here for people to put in their ideas regarding this skin. What champion would you like to see with this skin and what kind of effects would suit.

My first thought is maybe Vi since her Q and her R could be potentially animated as actual tackles.

For the skin maybe chroma packs for different teams. 

Also maybe Lee and he could be running around with a footy and throw one at enemies and jump and tackle them.

replies.body: AllBlack rengar, he already does the haka so why not
He should be Ma'a Nonu! The braids would work perfectly
Richie McCaw Twisted Fate, since they're both abject cheaters

lmao! sounds like you're still burnt from the RWC, Richie McCaw is a great player, it was just his and the All blacks time to shine (again) All Blacks won't do great next yr in rugby, it usually happens, the great one minute and next they are crap. Aussie played a great game! kinda was hoping they would win hahaha
Football.... really... you want to bring football into a game of league of legends so we're constantly reminded of how fcking mind numbing the sport is?
Forward {{champion:27}} ,pushing away enemy's in his path
Haha these are some great ideas, I really like the Rengar one.
